paper_abstract: We discuss a six-dimensional, time-dependent real wavepacket (RWP) code designed to obtain reaction probabilities for ABC(v(l))+ D -> AB+CD four-atom reactions, where v(l) is a collective index for the initial quantum state of the triatomic molecule. The code provides exact results for total angular momentum J = 0, and invokes the helicity decoupling (or centrifugal sudden) approximation for J > 0. Our new RWP code has been extensively checked by considering the benchmark H + H2O -> H-2 + OH abstraction reaction.
paper_title: Real wavepacket code for ABC plus D -> AB plus CD reactive scattering
